pages.title: Architecture
pages.description: Overview of webtor-rs architecture including crate structure and data flow

pages.title: Circuit Management
pages.description: How Tor circuits are created, managed, and reused with stream isolation

pages.title: Transports
pages.description: Snowflake and WebTunnel transport implementations for WASM and native

pages.title: TLS Implementation
pages.description: SubtleCrypto-based TLS for WASM via subtle-tls crate

repo_notes: webtor-rs uses vendored Arti/tor-proto crates for WASM compatibility
Congestion control parameters in circuit.rs match Arti 1.8.0 defaults (cc_xoff_client=500, cc_xoff_exit=500, cc_xon_rate=500)
Consensus data is embedded at compile time from webtor/src/cached/ and updated daily by GitHub Actions
ring crate doesn't compile to WASM, so subtle-tls provides TLS via browser's SubtleCrypto API
